verses.roman:
alaukika-gandha-svāda, anya-vismāraṇa
mahā-mādaka haya ei kṛṣṇādharera guṇa

synonyms: alaukika—uncommon; gandha—fragrance; svāda—taste; anya-vismāraṇa—forgetting all others; mahā-mādaka—highly enchanting; haya—are; ei—these; kṛṣṇa-adharera—of the lips of Kṛṣṇa; guṇa—attributes.
translation: "An uncommon, greatly enchanting fragrance and taste that makes one forget all other experiences are attributes of Kṛṣṇa's lips.
